GSD.description:
misc/libmasm/module: Fix two use after free in ibmasm_init_one

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.52 by commit b9c87ce3bc6331f82811a8cf8e930423c22523a3. For more details please see the references link.
